title: Liberty, Ambition & Tragedy: Hamilton & the American Story
description:
I speak with Stephen Clouse whose specializes in the political philosophy of Aristotle along with the American founders. We look at our current cultural context via the broadway musical Hamilton, a story that has resonated with Americans on many levels. This was such an enjoyable talk and I so appreciate Stephen for taking the time! 
**Note there are some sound issues I could not resolve so I apologize for the quality

Listen to podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Liberty--Ambition--Tragedy-Hamilton--the-American-Story-ejah51

My first interview with Stephen: https://youtu.be/6hGMcEAQAbM
Follow Stephen on twitter: @sclouse2

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
